entry.title: 3/24 - RITES OF PASSAGE: National Emerging Artists Exhibition [$500 BEST OF SHOW AWARD!!]
entry.content:
Manifest Creative Research Gallery and Drawing Center
üìç Cincinnati, OH, United States
üé® All Disciplines
üìÖ 03/24/2019 deadline
üí∞ $25.00 fee
‚û° Apply


====== DESCRIPTION ======

Open to Juniors, Seniors and Recent Undergrads.

For a fifteenth straight year the Cincinnati based non-profit arts organization and gallery, Manifest, presents an open call for artwork from students and the recently graduated in regional, national, and international college undergraduate programs. We believe there exists tremendous unexposed potential among people pursuing degrees in the visual arts.

This exhibit will feature the best work from artists about to receive or recently awarded an undergraduate degree from a regional, national, or international college art or design program. All entrants must have received or be scheduled to receive a college undergraduate degree in 2018, 2019, or 2020, and provide a current academic reference‚Äôs contact info.

A $500 award will be granted to the work receiving Best of Show. Rites also offers a Director's Choice Award, a non-monetary recognition of a work chosen by Manifest's Executive Director as deserving particular distinction.


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

To view the full prospectus and access the entry form visit http://www.manifestgallery.org

For questions email info@manifestgallery.org

entry.title: 4/28 - Call for Entries: "Habitats"
entry.content:
Target Gallery
üìç Alexandria, VA, United States
üé® All Visual Arts
üìÖ 04/28/2019 deadline
üí∞ $35.00 fee
‚û° Apply


====== DESCRIPTION ======

Target Gallery invites artists working in all visual media to submit to "Habitats". In this group exhibition, "Habitats" will explore the relationship between humans and nature, creating a dialogue on the impact that we make on the earth and our environments.


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

To view prospectus and to apply, please go to our website: torpedofactory.org/artopps
